q3: I think my favorite player is Sergio Busquet
a3: Sergio Busquet is ok, but he is no Messi.
q5: Who can be Spain's next big star attacking player?
a5: I think Marco Asensio because he is a young player who is new to the Spain team and has a lot to learn from the older more experienced players and has a lot of time to develop skill.
